issue.title: [Urban Feature] Make the upload simulation window a bit wider

content.raw:
Would it be possible to use a smaller font or to wrap the url for the docker image url after it is entered and is displayed in the “Robots to Submit”?

Currently my mandatory portion of the url is 71 characters.  I actually have a bit more than 9 characters that are visible when I enter the urls.  But, when they are displayed in the “Robots to Submit” portion the urls are clipped to about 77 characters.  It would be nice to see more than 6 characters for the name for images to be able to better check the submission for a test run.
content.html:
Would it be possible to use a smaller font or to wrap the url for the docker image url after it is entered and is displayed in the “Robots to Submit”?

Currently my mandatory portion of the url is 71 characters. I actually have a bit more than 9 characters that are visible when I enter the urls. But, when they are displayed in the “Robots to Submit” portion the urls are clipped to about 77 characters. It would be nice to see more than 6 characters for the name for images to be able to better check the submission for a test run.
